translation.en: ♪ I say you can't bеcause I lost it When I knew you were alive ♪ ♪ I'll go anywhere you wanna go ♪
[principal over PA] Happy New Year, Truham boys.
Uh, don't forget there'll now be students from all school years
translation.it: Ricordate che ci saranno studenti di tutti gli anni

translation.en: in your new form groups. I hope you enjoy getting to know
translation.it: nei nuovi gruppi di lavoro. Potrete conoscere… NUOVA AULA

translation.en: some fresh faces in registration each day.
Oh! If it isn't Charlie Spring. Happy New Year.
Where did I put you on the seating plan?
He's in Year 11, so only one year older than you.
translation.it: È dell'ultimo anno, poco più grande di te.

translation.en: One of the rugby boys too, I think. I'm sure you'll get along swimmingly.
translation.it: Ed è nella squadra di rugby. Senz'altro andrete d'accordo.

translation.en: Or you can just sit in silence for the rest of the year.
translation.it: Altrimenti puoi stare in silenzio tutto l'anno.

translation.en: It really doesn't affect me in any way whatsoever.
translation.it: A me non fa né caldo né freddo.

translation.en: I missed your face so much.
translation.it: Mi è mancato tanto il tuo viso.

translation.en: Really? Did you have a good Christmas?
translation.it: Davvero? Hai passato un bel Natale?

translation.en: Yeah, it was all right. You?
Yeah. Yeah, it was good. Um…
My whole family was around on Christmas day and then…
translation.it: C'era tutta la famiglia, e poi…

translation.en: -Still don't tell anyone about this. -Oh. Um…

translation.it: - Vai da quella parte? - Sì. A matematica.

translation.en: Are you literally doing your homework while walking to your lesson?
translation.it: Ma davvero fai i compiti mentre vai a lezione?

translation.en: That makes me sound way cooler than I actually am.
translation.it: Così sembro più cool di quanto non sia.

translation.en: Do you want me to do that for you?
-No, I'm good. -I can tell you the answer.
translation.it: - Non serve. - Ti dico la risposta.

translation.en: If you're stuck I can just… Let me just…
[chuckles] Why are you talking to me? I don't know who you are.
translation.it: Perché ti rivolgi a me? Io non ti conosco.

translation.en: Uh, yeah. He's in my year.

translation.it: Ho comprato da bere per Elle.

translation.en: -Didn't you do that yesterday? -Yes, Isaac. Yes, I did.
translation.it: - Non l'hai fatto anche ieri? - Sì, Isaac, esatto.

translation.en: -She's not been here all week. -I know. I keep forgetting.
translation.it: - Manca da inizio settimana. - Lo so. Ma me lo scordo.

translation.en: Tao, you're allowed to miss her.
translation.it: Tao, non c'è problema se ti manca.

translation.en: It's better that she's at an all-girls school.
translation.it: È meglio che vada in una scuola femminile.

translation.en: Mr. Reed was still refusing to call her Elle.
translation.it: Il prof. Reed ancora si rifiutava di chiamarla Elle.

translation.en: Yeah. Mr. Reed's a massive transphobe.
There used to be four of us, now there's only three.
translation.it: Eravamo sempre in quattro, ora siamo tre.

translation.en: The guy you sit next to in form?
translation.it: Il tuo compagno di banco nel gruppo?

translation.en: -Who? -[Tao] He looks like a golden retriever.
[Charlie] He doesn't look like a golden retriever.
I can't believe you've been sat next to rugby king Nick Nelson.
translation.it: È incredibile. Sei compagno di banco del re del rugby.

translation.en: What are you going to talk about?
Charlie, you don't have a tissue, do you?
translation.it: Charlie, per caso hai un fazzoletto?

translation.en: -[Nick] It's not coming off. -You're gonna be blue forever.
translation.it: - Non viene via. - Rimarrai blu per sempre.

translation.en: Looks like I'm wearing blue gloves!
translation.it: Sembra che abbia i guanti blu!

translation.en: You can make it the new school fashion.
Or I'll pretend it's a tattoo.
translation.it: O fingere che sia un tatuaggio.

translation.en: We are a group. No, a trio of borderline outcasts.
translation.it: Siamo un gruppo… No, un trio di emarginati borderline.

translation.en: He is the star player on the rugby team,
translation.it: Lui è la stella della squadra di rugby

translation.en: and he's friends with a bunch of loud, gross Year 11s
translation.it: ed è amico di un gruppo di selvaggi dell'ultimo anno

translation.en: who are like the guys who bullied you last year.
translation.it: uguali a quelli che ti bullizzavano.

translation.en: I bet he's a whole different person when he's with his bro dude friends.
translation.it: Scommetto che è un'altra persona quando è con i suoi amici virili.

translation.en: [woman] Lunch ends in five minutes, girls.
translation.it: Mancano cinque minuti. SCUOLA FEMMINILE HIGGS

translation.en: We don't make exceptions, even for new students.
translation.it: Non facciamo eccezioni, neanche per le nuove.

translation.en: You can have this back from reception at the end of the day.
translation.it: Potrai riprenderlo all'ingresso a fine giornata.

translation.en: [Ben] You know I'm sorry about ignoring you yesterday.
translation.it: Sai che mi dispiace averti ignorato, ieri.

translation.en: [teacher] It's quite a while since you've hidden in here at lunch.
translation.it: Era da tanto che non ti nascondevi qui a pranzo.

translation.en: No bullies I need to sort out again?
Actually, there is kind of someone.
I don't think he even thinks we're boyfriends anyway.
translation.it: Non credo che ci consideri una coppia.

translation.en: He doesn't even like people seeing us talk to each other in the corridors.
translation.it: E non vuole che gli altri ci vedano parlare nei corridoi.

translation.en: He pretends like he doesn't know who I am.
[sighs] But then when it's just us two he's fine.
translation.it: Ma quando siamo soli è carino.

translation.en: Well, have you talked to him about how that makes you feel?
translation.it: Beh, gli hai spiegato quello che provi?

translation.en: Maybe you should talk to him then?
translation.it: Forse sarebbe il caso di farlo?

translation.en: What do you want me to say? Break up with him?
translation.it: Cosa vuoi che dica? Che devi lasciarlo?

translation.en: -[Charlie] I don't know. -Well, do you want to break up with him?
translation.it: Non lo so. Tu vuoi mollarlo?

translation.en: I can't solve your problems for you, Charlie.
translation.it: Non posso risolvere i tuoi problemi.

translation.en: What about your friends, have you talked to them about it?
translation.it: E ai tuoi amici l'hai raccontato?

translation.en: It's better to be honest about your feelings in the long run.
translation.it: Sui sentimenti è sempre meglio essere sinceri.

translation.en: I know. It took you three months to tell me you were being bullied.
translation.it: Lo so. Ci hai messo tre mesi a dirmi dei bulli.

translation.en: -I'd never lie to you, don't worry. -Okay.
translation.it: - Non ti mentirei mai, credimi. - Ok.

translation.en: -We will. If you're nice. -Never mind then.
I broke up with my boyfriend.
Hypothetically, what sort of boy do you want to go out with?
translation.it: Potendo scegliere, con che tipo di ragazzo usciresti?

translation.en: One who doesn't mind people seeing us talk to each other would be nice.
translation.it: Con uno che se ne frega se gli altri ci vedono parlare.

translation.en: or do you want an "opposites attract" thing?
I don't think I can afford to be that specific, to be honest.
translation.it: Non credo di poter essere tanto esigente.
In teoria. Il tuo ragazzo dei sogni.

translation.en: Just someone I can have a laugh with.

translation.it: E che stia bene con me.

translation.en: I'd probably just settle for someone tall.
translation.it: Ma mi accontenterei di uno alto.

translation.en: We've been doing this all term and no one's beaten Charlie's time yet.
translation.it: Ci alleniamo da una vita e il tempo di Charlie è ancora imbattuto.

translation.en: Charlie's leaving you all in the dust!
translation.it: Charlie vi fa mangiare la polvere!

translation.en: So, um, I had something I wanted to ask you.
Charlie… I wanted to tell you that I'm gay too.
translation.it: Charlie… Volevo dirti che anch'io sono gay.

translation.en: And I'm in love with you.
Do you want to go out with me?
I want to be with you forever.
translation.it: Voglio stare con te per sempre.

translation.en: Do you want to join the rugby team?
translation.it: Ti va di giocare a rugby?

translation.en: We have enough players for the team
but we're not allowed to actually play against other teams without a reserve.
translation.it: ma non possiamo giocare senza una riserva.

translation.en: And I saw you run in PE and you're, like, really fast.
translation.it: Ti ho visto correre e sei molto veloce.

translation.en: So… I thought you might be interested.
I don't really know how to play.
translation.it: È che non so proprio giocare.

translation.en: That's fine. I can teach you.
Aren't I a bit small and weak to be a rugby player?
translation.it: Non sono un po' troppo esile e gracile per giocare e rugby?

translation.en: We're just a school team, you know. It's not that serious.
translation.it: Siamo una squadra scolastica. Niente di impegnativo.

translation.en: So you're saying I am small and weak?
So, do you want to join?
It's literally just another silly crush.
It's not a crush. I don't just fall for any guy who's nice to me.
translation.it: No. Non mi innamoro di chiunque sia gentile con me.

translation.en: And you're sure you want to spend a whole hour
translation.it: E sei sicuro di voler passare un'ora

translation.en: -[boy 2] Isn't he in Year 8? -[boy 3] No. Year 10.
translation.it: - Fa le medie? - È al secondo superiore.

translation.en: I'm sure he's a nice guy but we actually want to be dece.
translation.it: Sarà simpatico, ma dobbiamo giocare bene.
Lo sanno tutti che è gay.

translation.en: I know I was joking about being weak, but I'm definitely too weak for this.
translation.it: Scherzavo dicendo che sono gracile, ma adesso non ho più dubbi.

translation.en: Just try. Tackle me, I won't dodge.
translation.it: Provaci. Placcami, io non mi scanso.

translation.en: Come on, I bet you can do it.
translation.it: Dai, scommetto che ce la fai.

translation.en: Now, let's try again while I'm actually moving.
Yeah, you got it. One more time, come on.
One, two, three, squeeze! One, two, three, squeeze!
[boy] Come on, mate. We've got practice.

translation.it: - Cerco di andare in meta. - Sì.

translation.en: And you try and run up to me.
You're wearing a coat? It's not even cold.
translation.it: Hai il cappotto? Non fa freddo.

translation.en: God, what's your problem? I'm trying to be nice.
translation.it: Che ti prende? Volevo essere carino.

translation.en: I said I don't want to meet up anymore.
translation.it: Ho detto che non voglio più vederti.
- Sì, e io non ci credo. - Cosa?

translation.en: You're clearly just scared of getting caught.
translation.it: Hai solo paura che ci scoprano, è chiaro.

translation.en: Why would I be scared of getting caught?
Everyone in school already knows I'm gay.
translation.it: Tutta la scuola sa già che sono gay.

translation.en: You're the one who's scared of getting caught.
translation.it: Tu hai paura di essere scoperto.

translation.en: You can't even look at me when other people are around.
translation.it: Se ci sono altre persone non mi guardi neanche.

translation.en: Not to mention the fact that you have a girlfriend.
translation.it: Senza contare che hai la ragazza.

translation.en: Yeah. I've seen you with her at the school gate.
translation.it: Già. Ti ho visto con lei all'ingresso.
Ah, no. Non me l'hai detto.

translation.en: Don't be angry at me for not wanting to come out yet.
translation.it: Ce l'hai con me perché non faccio coming out?

translation.en: If you're figuring stuff out, fine. Take your time.
translation.it: Se stai cercando di chiarirti le idee, va bene.

translation.en: I would have been there for you.
Don't you think I, of all people, would understand you're figuring out your sexuality?
translation.it: Non pensi che possa capire come ti puoi sentire?

translation.en: Then why are you angry at me?
translation.it: E perché ce l'hai con me?

translation.en: I'm angry because you never even slightly cared about my feelings.
translation.it: Perché te ne sei sempre fregato dei miei sentimenti.

translation.en: We only ever meet up when you want to.
translation.it: Ci vediamo solo quando vuoi tu.

translation.en: Where you want to. When you feel like kissing a boy.
translation.it: Dove vuoi tu. Quando hai voglia di baciare un ragazzo.

translation.en: You don't care about me at all.
translation.it: Non te ne frega niente di me.

translation.en: It's not like anyone else is going to want to go out with you, is it?
translation.it: Non è che sei pieno di spasimanti. O sbaglio?

translation.en: -I know you like me. -[Charlie] Stop it!
translation.it: - Lo so che ti piaccio. - Smettila!

translation.en: Charlie, I like you but I'm figuring stuff out.
translation.it: Charlie, mi piaci. Devo chiarirmi le idee.

translation.en: What more do you want from me?
Did you hear all of that?
You seemed kind of like something was up while we were getting changed, so I…
translation.it: Mentre ti cambiavi ho notato che eri strano, per cui…

translation.en: I wanted to check everything was okay.
translation.it: Volevo controllare che fosse tutto ok.

translation.en: You have nothing to be sorry about.
-I kind of want to say it. -[chuckles] Don't.
We'll get locked in if we stay here much longer.

translation.it: SII GENTILE ONLINE 15 MINUTI FA VI SEGUITE SU INSTAGRAM
